about_the_game:
"

Portal Packs - Token Essentials: Cultists, Cutthroats & Cutpurses


Art by:  Allen Michael N. Geneta  




Layout by: Anna Michelle  Meservier  


Enter the Portal into a world of danger!
Cultists, Cutthroats, and Cutpurses is yet another entry in our ongoing & popular series of PC, NPC and Monster tokens.
Expand your cast of villains with 24 beautifully drawn tokens. These ne'er do wells are perfect for adventures on high seas, deep dungeons, city streets or otherwise. Additionally, each token has eleven color variants so you can find just the right style for your campaign.
As always our tokens are fully compatible with any of our One Minute Maps series.
Enjoy! "
